html: We had some brilliant actors playing Tiny Tim last year and we'd love to get similar brilliance this year. If you are over 9, under 4’6” and disabled the theatre would love to talk to you. html: Anniversary night was a trip to the @oldvictheatre to see “A Monsrer Calls”. Simply brilliant. Fantastic cast, inventive staging and the music is incredible. Even bump enjoyed it (we think that was clapping going on in there!) #OVMonster D
text:
Anniversary night was a trip to the @oldvictheatre to see “A Monsrer Calls”. Simply brilliant. Fantastic cast, inventive staging and the music is incredible. Even bump enjoyed it (we think that was clapping going on in there!) #OVMonster 
D

Morning. Can’t beat a massive lie in and a day off! I hope you’ve got a nice Saturday planned.

Just wanted to say thanks for all the lovely messages this week during #bgt, you’re all very kind!  
Have a great day. D
